features.name: The Greenbelt
features.description: A 25 mile long pathway beside the Boise River. Perfect for walking or biking.

features.name: The Old Idaho Penitentiary
features.description: A historic prison that now operates as a museum with fascinating exhibits.

features.name: Freak Alley
features.description: A vibrant outdoor gallery of street art in downtown Boise.

features.name: Bogus Basin Mountain
features.address: 2600 N Bogus Basin Road, Boise, ID 83702
features.description: Offers skiing, snowboarding, and tubing in the winter as well as hiking and mountain biking in the summer.

features.name: The Boise Depot
features.description: A restored spanish style train station that is a popular spot for events and photography.

features.name: Table Rock
features.address: 3199 E Table Rock Rd, Boise, ID 83712
features.description: A prominent plateau that overlooks Boise. Can be hiked to or driven to.

features.name: The World Center for Birds of Prey
features.address: 5668 W Flying Hawk Ln, Boise, ID 83709
features.description: A conservation and education center designed for all sorts of birds of prey.

features.name: The Idaho Botanical Garden
features.address: 2355 N Old Penitentiary Rd, Boise, ID 83712
features.description: A 50 acre garden that features a diversity of plant life.
